title: Pertoča
text:
Pertoča (; in older sources also "Prtoča", , ) is a <a href="village">village</a> in the <a href="Municipality%20of%20Roga%C5%A1ovci">Municipality of Rogašovci</a> in the <a href="Prekmurje">Prekmurje</a> region of northeastern <a href="Slovenia">Slovenia</a>.
The <a href="parish%20church">parish church</a> in the village is dedicated to <a href="Helena%20%28Empress%29">Saint Helena</a>. It belongs to the <a href="Roman%20Catholic%20Diocese%20of%20Murska%20Sobota">Roman Catholic Diocese of Murska Sobota</a>. It was originally a Gothic building dating to the 16th century. In the 1960s the original church was demolished and rebuilt in a modern style.
